Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

Northbound #172 buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Belmont, Racine and Clark, due to police activity near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Belmont, Racine and Clark, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to police activity near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 71st/Michigan
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, King Drive, 69th and into terminal: due to, street blockage near 71st/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, King Drive, 69th and into terminal: due to, street blockage near 71st/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
